text: te brasenbae puokke ngeak chenh( pi chomnue)vinh yeung minban banhchoun anak( mou ham meat) daembi karpar puokke laey . tuonati robsa anak kreante chea anak phsaapvophsaeay sar bonnaoh . haey pitabrakd nasa nowpel del yeung banaoy mnoussa lok phloksa nouv kdei me tda krounea pi yeung ke sabbayrikreay nung vea . te brasenbae ampeuaeakrak ban thleak leu puokke daoysaarte avei del puokke ban br pru td kanlongomk ( puokke bercha rmilkoun towvinh) . dau che neah pitabrakd nasa mnoussa lok ku rmilkoun bamphot
